array.string: This is the famous Bore & Ratter weapon rotator. It circles your weapons clockwise or anticlockwise through your front, aft, storeboard and port weapon mounts. You would not want to be in a combat situation without it. It helps perfectly to switch between your lasers, while mining and fighting. Comes without lasers.

This is the famous Bore & Ratter weapon rotator. It circles your weapons clockwise or anticlockwise through your front, aft, storeboard and port weapon mounts. Be aware that you might be offered much cheaper entities of this device. Remember they may turn out to be nothing but a cheap imitation of the original product.
